alert.note: Alert for Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 9:17PM MDT until further notice by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Montana... Milk River at Nashua affecting Valley County. For the Milk River...including Saco, Tampico, Malta, Dodson, Glasgow, Nashua...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Milk River at Nashua. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM MDT Wednesday the stage was 25.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM MDT Wednesday was 25.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 27.5 feet early Wednesday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 27.0 feet on 04/02/1943. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning by 1100 AM MDT.
